skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.LaunchProjectile
skill.description: For an agent to launch a specified quantity of projectile on a given target, with a specified type of dotation, from a position. The position is can be issued or not. In the last case, agent will move toward the target until it is able to launch the projectile.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The target to launch projectile on.

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The position from which agent unit launch the projectile (optional). If no position issued, agent moves to target until it can launch a projectile.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resourse to use per time unit.

parameter.name: dotationType
parameter.description: The type of projectile (resource dotation type) to launch to hit the target.

link.name: reach
link.description: To reach the launch position or the target.

link.name: launchProjectile
link.description: To launch projectile on the specified target.

resource.name: agent.behaviors.resources.Launcher
resource.description: An agent cannot launch projectile at more than one target at once.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is completed (projectile with specifier quantity of resource dotationn has been launched).
